name: Meteorbytes
description:
This is a really early beta/alpha game. I am not how sure I will be taking this project, but I hope to make it a bullet-hell-esque game. 

I will not be asking for donations yet, I will most likely ask for donations later on in the development phase. Please provide any first thoughts, ideas, impressions in the comments section below or contact me directly at draceonwings@gmail.com

I'm going to updating this game regularly so please check back around once a week to see the new features.

Here is what I have so far:

  • Use W, A, S, D to move and space to shoot.
  • Destroying meteorites gives you points.
  • Grey meteorites are destroyed in one hit.
  • Red meteorites split into 3 smaller meteorites on hit.
  • The laser stations cannot be destroyed. Avoid them and their lasers, but their lasers can destroy meteorites (will also give you points).
  • Mega cannons shoot large laser balls at you, they're harder to avoid and the mega cannons aim at you.
  • Mines will lock onto you as they get close but lose track of you if they are too close.
  • You can set your name and record the top 5 scores.
